message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product. It's worth more than $80 to me, reflecting its high quality and unique features. Considering its value, I propose a price of $120 for it. This offer includes free shipping and a 30-day satisfaction guarantee. Would you like to accept this offer?
Thank you for your offer, Alice. I appreciate the free shipping and satisfaction guarantee. I would like to propose a counteroffer of $95 for the product. I hope this aligns better with my budget.

Thank you for your counteroffer, Bob. While I understand your budget constraints, I must maintain the value proposition of our product. I am unable to accept $95 for the item. However, I am willing to negotiate further. How about considering $100 for the product? This still reflects its value while being more accessible to your budget.

I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, Alice. After careful consideration, I would like to counter with an offer of $97 for the product. I believe this strikes a balance between respecting the value of the item and fitting within my budget.
